item.description: Friends of mine sent me this-informal and fun. St. Dimitrie Romanian Orthodox Church In cooperation with Harry's Wine and Liquor Present… A Wine Tasting To Benefit St. Dimitrie Church Date: Friday, November 11, 2011 Time: 7:00pm - 9:00pm Place: St. Dimitrie Church Hall 504 Sport Hill Road Easton, CT Tickets: $25.00 / $30.00 at the door Wine tasting, hors d’oeuvres & sweets Chinese Auction To purchase tickets, please contact: Patti Johnson 203 374 0679 Karen Jordan 203 268 8439 / karenjordan35@sbcglobal.net Kathleen LiCastri 203 268 8237 / stdrocsecty@gmail.com My friends are Romanian- LEts be adventurous and make Romanian or lile countries appetizers to add and share. We can reserve a table.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Wine tasting and benefit! With St. Dimitri and Harry Wine
